Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Central Park
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Kedzie, 71st, Pulaski and 79th due to street blockage near 79th/Central Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Kedzie, 71st, Pulaski and 79th, due to street blockage near 79th/Central Park.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks near 35th/Archer. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks near 35th/Archer. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
